pli-tv-pvr2.10:1.1: Yaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ussayavādikāya bhikkhuniyā aḍḍaṁ karaṇapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:2.1: Yaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ussayavādikāya bhikkhuniyā aḍḍaṁ karaṇapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:2.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī ussayavādikā vihari, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:2.26: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:2.27: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe…
pli-tv-pvr2.10:6.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī coriṁ vuṭṭhāpesi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:6.9: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:6.10: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe…. #2
pli-tv-pvr2.10:7.1: Ekā gāmantaraṁ gamanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:7.6: Aññatarā bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṁ gacchi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:8.1: Samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ bhikkhuniṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṁ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṁ osāraṇapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:8.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ bhikkhuniṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṁ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṁ osāresi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:9.1: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:9.6: Sundarīnandā bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato āmisaṁ paṭiggahesi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:10.1: “Kiṁ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṁ anavassutā.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:10.2: Iṅgha, ayye, yaṁ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā taṁ tvaṁ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti uyyojanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:10.8: “kiṁ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṁ anavassutā.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:10.9: Iṅgha, ayye, yaṁ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā taṁ tvaṁ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti uyyojesi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:11.1: Kupitāya anattamanāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:11.6: Caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṁ avaca—
pli-tv-pvr2.10:11.7: “buddhaṁ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṁ paccācikkhāmi, saṅghaṁ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṁ paccācikkhāmī”ti, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:12.1: Kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:12.6: Caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ avaca—
pli-tv-pvr2.10:12.7: “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, dosagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, mohagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”ti, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:13.1: Saṁsaṭṭhānaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:13.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo saṁsaṭṭhā vihariṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:14.2: Mā tumhe nānā viharitthā”ti uyyojentiyā yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:14.9: Mā tumhe nānā viharitthā”ti uyyojesi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:15.1: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā pāṭidesanīyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:15.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjiṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:17.3: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa adhakkhakaṁ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṁ gahaṇaṁ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:17.4: bhikkhu kāyena kāyaṁ āmasati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:17.8: kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati. #1
pli-tv-pvr2.10:18.3: Bhikkhunī jānaṁ pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicchādeti, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:19.1: Yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:19.2: Yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:19.3: Ukkhittānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:19.6: bhedakānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:19.7: pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa—
pli-tv-pvr2.10:19.8: yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati. #3
pli-tv-pvr2.10:20.1: Aṭṭhamaṁ vatthuṁ paripūraṇapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:20.2: Aṭṭhamaṁ vatthuṁ paripūraṇapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:20.4: “itthannāmaṁ okāsaṁ āgacchā”ti vuttā gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:20.7: aṭṭhamaṁ vatthuṁ paripūraṇapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. #4
pli-tv-pvr2.10:22.1: Ussayavādikā bhikkhunī aḍḍaṁ karaṇapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:24.1: Ekā gāmantaraṁ gamanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:24.3: paṭhamaṁ pādaṁ parikkhepaṁ atikkāmeti, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:25.1: Samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ bhikkhuniṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṁ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṁ osāraṇapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:26.1: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:27.1: “Kiṁ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṁ anavassutā.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:27.2: Iṅgha, ayye, yaṁ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā taṁ tvaṁ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti, uyyojanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:27.3: Tassā vacanena khādissāmi bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.10:28.1: Kupitā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:29.1: Kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:30.1: Saṁsaṭṭhā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:31.1: “Saṁsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha, mā tumhe nānā viharitthā”ti uyyojentī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:34.1: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.10:34.2: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.10:34.5: dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati. #11
